TEXT.S:
Zaid Abdul-Aziz
sukay niza Amilika a tademaw, tatama, nalecuhan i 4 a bulad 7 a demiad, 1946 a mihcan. ngangan niza ci Zaid Abdul-Aziz, u miunduay ciniza. u kanas-mali mimaliay. Zaid Abdul-Aziz i 1968 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 5, namapili' tu nu Cincinnati Royals putiput.
